== Mattoor (CT) (627972) ==

Mattoor (CT) is a town in the [[Aluva]] taluka of [[Ernakulam]] district with an area of 9.77 sq. km. and harbouring 4728 households with total population of 18890 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kakkanad]] is at a distance of 28 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 258 km. Male population is 9322 and female population is 9568. Scheduled Caste population is 2404 and Scheduled Tribes population is 44. Census Location Code of the town is 627972<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class IV (population_total 10,000 to 19,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 38 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 38 km. Railway station is at Angamaly at a distance of 9 km.
